definition: Kangle county in Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu
Kangle county in Linxia Hui autonomous prefecture 臨夏回族自治州|临夏回族自治州[Lin2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Swimming is Hong Kong's most popular summer pastime.
sentences.chinese: 游泳是香港人最喜爱的夏日康乐活动。

sentences.english: It gives sufficient recreation to people.
sentences.chinese: 它给人足够的康乐活动。

sentences.english: The Hong Kong Museum of Art is one of the museums managed by the Leisure & Cultural Services Department.
sentences.chinese: 香港艺术馆是康乐及文化事务署辖下博物馆之一。

sentences.english: Chairman of Kincline Poetry Society in 1993.
Other facilities such as electronic Majong tables and chess board are offered to enrich your leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 公馆为您提供棋牌康乐设施，让您充分享受休闲时光。

sentences.english: The Recreational and Diversional Therapy Unit is subvented by the Community Chest.
sentences.chinese: 康乐治疗小组是公益金资助的其中一项服务。

sentences.english: In addition, the hotel also has full recreational facilities and supporting services.
sentences.chinese: 此外，酒店还设有齐全的康乐设施和配套服务。

sentences.english: She is presently the Chief Manager of Leisure and Cultural Services Department.
sentences.chinese: 现时她是康乐及文化事务署的总文化事务经理。

sentences.english: Description: Organises services and activities related to leisure, sports, culture and the arts.
sentences.chinese: 统筹与康乐体育及文化艺术有关的活动和服务。

sentences.english: Next stop is Hong Lok Road.
Contents of the programmes do not represent the views of the Leisure and Cultural Services Department.
sentences.chinese: 各项节目内容并不反映康乐及文化事务署的意见。

sentences.english: Eventually, possession and sale of recreational drugs will be decriminalized.
sentences.chinese: 最后，藏有及售卖与康乐将毒品合法化。

sentences.english: Contraception now is a easy topic. The appearance of Kanropo make contracept a relax topic.
sentences.chinese: 康乐宝的出现使得避孕越来越成为一个轻松话题。

sentences.english: Provides residential services and recreational activities for the elderly in both Hong Kong and throughout mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 为香港及中国内地的长者提供颐养服务及康乐活动。

sentences.english: In the course of the RCIA journey, recreational activities are also organized for the building of friendship between participants.
sentences.chinese: 慕道过程中也举办一些康乐活动，促进彼此间的友谊。

definition: to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
